response.original_title: Normal For Us: The Miller Twins
response.overview: The inspiring story of one family's love and determination in the face of enormous challenges. So their daughters could experience a "normal" lifestyle, the Millers built their home to accommodate the twins' special needs and designs their own two-of-a-kind wheelchairs that offer extraordinary mobility even commercial power wheelchairs can't touch. Through the struggles and the triumphs, the Millers have raised two fun-loving teenagers who enjoy hiking, playing dodgeball and hanging out at the mall.
response.title: Normal For Us: The Miller Twins
